query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aac_boards (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  professionalId INT NOT NULL,
  studentId INT,
  name VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  context ENUM('escola', 'clinica', 'casa', 'biblioteca', 'lazer', 'alimentacao', 'higiene', 'transporte', 'personalizado') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'personalizado',
  description TEXT,
  isTemplate BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS aac_cards (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  boardId INT NOT NULL,
  label VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,
  emoji VARCHAR(16),
  imageUrl TEXT,
  audioUrl TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(128),
  color VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT '#6366f1',
  position INT DEFAULT 0,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
